wide.label: Wide mode
wide.description: Allows the grid to extend beyond page width in widescreen

column.label: Number of columns
column.description: The number of cards on a single row (max 6)

bottom1.label: Card 1 bottom
bottom1.description: The text on the bottom section of card 1

page1.label: Card 1 button link
page1.description: The page linked by the button on card 1

pagetext1.label: Card 1 button text
pagetext1.description: The text displayed on the button on card 1

bylinetop1.label: Card 1 top byline
bylinetop1.description: The byline text above the title on card 1

bylinebottom1.label: Card 1 bottom byline
bylinebottom1.description: The byline text below the title on card 1

colorbyline1.label: Card 1 byline color
colorbyline1.description: The color of the byline on card 1

colortitle1.label: Card 1 title color
colortitle1.description: The color of the title on card 1

colorbgbottom1.label: Card 1 bottom background color
colorbgbottom1.description: The background color of the bottom section of card 1

colorbottom1.label: Card 1 bottom text color
colorbottom1.description: The text color in the bottom section of card 1

colorbgbutton1.label: Card 1 button background color
colorbgbutton1.description: The background color of the button on card 1

description: This template is a template for generating cards in a grid or row layout on a page. Currently only a maximum of six cards are supported in Visual Editing, please refer to the template page for advanced syntax.
